reviews.author: Victoria Keevers
reviews.text: Absolutely incredible! Justin was great and the whole experience was just fantastic. We had beautiful weather and amazing views, I highly recommend going with Airlie Beach Helicopters üòÑ

reviews.author: Customer
reviews.text: What an amazing experience, Justin was funny and knowledgeable. I Love that its a family run business. We flew around heart reef and got to spend a bit of time on Whitehaven beach.  Thankyou Justin and tabs for a great arvo !

reviews.author: Kylie Keeling
reviews.text: This is the most amazing experience. Everything from the very beginning to the final drop off was 5 Star. Justin has set up a magnificent personalised service. Would highly recommend

reviews.author: Customer
reviews.text: An absolute must ! An incredible experience. The price is really worth it! Thank you for this wonderful time !!

reviews.author: Suzanne Dutton
reviews.text: Fantastic experience flying with Justin today - magical tour of the Whitsundays with Justin telling us some history and island facts, delivered in a friendly manner.  Beautiful scenery - highly recommend.Lovely to meet your wife too!

reviews.author: Customer
reviews.text: Justin took myself and my wife up today for the Reef & Whitehaven spectacular. Spectacular is definitely the word for it. This with Justin's knowledge of the area and local knowledge make for an unbeatable experience,  make sure to ask for his local dining suggestions

reviews.author: Unique Views:
reviews.text: Offers bird's-eye vistas and angles impossible to get from the ground, revealing the true scale and beauty of landscapes, reefs, or cities.

reviews.author: Customer
reviews.text: Allows you to cover vast areas quickly, ideal for travelers with limited time to see places like the Great Barrier Reef or remote wilderness.

reviews.author: Thrilling & Memorable:
reviews.text: Thrilling & Memorable:The experience itself is exciting, from takeoff to the unique perspective, creating a highlight for many trips, notesBLADE.
